import sys

n_k = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
k = n_k[1]
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

# sum of k smallest numbers
a = sorted(a)
k_smallest = sum(a[:k])

print(k_smallest)

import sys

def solve():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a.sort()
    ans = sum(a[:k])
    print(ans)
    
def __starting_point():
    solve()
__starting_point()

# -*-coding: utf-8 -*-
from sys import stdin
for line in stdin:
    entrada = line.splitlines()
    break
n=int(entrada[0].split()[0])
k=int(entrada[0].split()[1])
numeros = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
numeros.sort()
suma = sum(numeros[:k])
print(suma)

firstLine = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
secondLine = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
